mapper.select: select noboard, subject, userid, content, reference, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from review where noboard=#{noboard}
select noboard, subject, userid, content, reference, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from review order by noboard desc
mapper.insert: insert into review(noboard, subject, userid, content, reference, ip) values(a_sq.nextval, #{subject}, #{userid}, #{content}, #{reference, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip})
mapper.update: update review set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where noboard=#{noboard} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from review where noboard=#{noboard} and userid=#{userid}
